Docs.summary: Scaffolds code-based migrations to apply pending model changes to the database.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the namespace used in the migration's generated code. By default, this is the same as MigrationsNamespace on the migrations configuration object passed into the constructor. For VB.NET projects, this will need to be updated to take into account the project's root namespace.
